customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Represents a customer of the warehouse.

name.description: The full name of the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer.

phone.description: The phone number of the customer.

address.description: The physical address of the customer.

fatherName.description: The father's name of the customer.

storageRecord.title: Storage Record
storageRecord.description: Represents a record of items being stored by a customer.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer who owns these items.

commodityDescription.description: A description of the commodity being stored.

location.description: The location within the warehouse where the items are stored (Lot No.).

bagsStored.description: The number of bags being stored.

storageStartDate.description: The date when the storage period began.

storageEndDate.description: The date when the storage period ended. Null if still active.

billingCycle.description: The current billing cycle for the record.

totalRentBilled.description: The total rent amount that has been billed for this record.

lorryTractorNo.description: The Lorry or Tractor number for the delivery.

weight.description: The weight of the stored items.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Represents a payment made towards a storage record.

date.description: The date the payment was made.
